courses.name: JROTC Army I
courses.description: Army JROTC's mission is \To Motivate Young People to Be Better Citizens.\ It provides means for cadets to develop citizenship

courses.name: JROTC Army II
courses.description: As students progress through the Army JROTC program

courses.name: JROTC Army III
courses.description: Students continue to build on their leadership skills and knowledge from previous JROTC courses. Advanced leadership development and applied leadership opportunities are emphasized. Students will also gain an appreciation for the contributions of the military to the history of our nation. Cadets wear Army provided uniforms one day a week and are provided with all learning materials. No military obligation is incurred.

courses.name: JROTC Army IV
courses.description: Students continue to develop their leadership skills through advanced leadership development and applied leadership opportunities. Students will learn extensive first aid

courses.name: JROTC Army Advanced
courses.description: This course provides advanced leadership opportunities and advanced skill development for students who have completed the JROTC program. Students will continue to develop citizenship
